text: The 2014 African Women's Handball Cup Winners' Cup was the 30th edition, organized by the African Handball Confederation, under the auspices of the International Handball Federation, the handball sport governing body. The tournament was held from May 19–30, 2014 in Oyo, Republic of the Congo, contested by 8 teams and won by Atlético Petróleos de Luanda of Angola. ==Draw== {| class="wikitable" !width=195px|Group A !width=195px|Group B |- |valign=top| ASEL FAP Yaoundé Inter Club Progresso |valign=top| ABO Sport Phoenix Gabon Petro Atlético TKC |} ==Preliminary rounds== :Times given below are in WAT UTC+1. ===Group A=== {| style="text-align:center" width=550 |- !
